Dear Hagop,
Curious about the impact of Gen AI on procurement in the Middle East? Explore our latest blog, "Leveraging Generative AI for Procurement in the Middle East." <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.ivalua.com%2Fe3t%2FCtc%2FWW%2B113%2Fc2Pz504%2FVVTrkK3bQwPxW16bt3p5WL91bW2lg-cV5mxGd0N4Pt_NR3qgyTW95jsWP6lZ3n_VtJm3B5D2FdjW6f7ngw51Yc9wW2kvQlM4l7ltLW80Sd0z1dtp-6W6Z88q33BpN8PW6Ms8VP5nvp0VN3qKLJs1zG2TW5PJKch4QCZC-W2xS8tW5tG009N3CZKvnKl0kdW3-GdfW79bjn5W6W-nMk8R8_trW6Jn9Ft7bcCzbV50scG6T2m5tW7SRVKg6StZ3bW6Wj2cG14cBxqW8fgjXw5YgthhW30Zr9X6Sv8lYW6cx02G1GgF73W2_2Sdn8hDHJsW1KpDW76pBtZZW61h9Hk1hS0V5N75m0R-5hv7rW8_dG8r1M8GKqW1-kLDJ5lj03HW3pB7qn4jp7GvW5g7dzb3XRGhgV6v0Cf3QNLMdVz-FlT4F0NjMW7V6P_y86YM98f6Mf5ml04&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C02eb44c967ac4d9d578e08dcf401ab63%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653535217594654%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MR%2FTWI2JjgHmKeS3GKIjLvGpvjrwRnyoXqQKvAtunkM%3D&reserved=0> 

In this article, we explore the game-changing potential of generative AI in procurement, offering key insights into how organizations in the region can harness this technology to boost efficiency and drive innovation.

Regional leaders emphasize its ability to streamline procurement processes and enhance decision-making, creating a more agile and competitive environment.
